Text: Re real options openingsThanks very much Im looking forward to it Chris At AM you wrote Chris We shall make arrangements to bring you over for an interview Our HR Department will contact you later this week Vince Christopher M Kenyon on AM To cc Subject real options openings Dear Vince Kaminski I was auditing Prof Dyers Real Options class on Thursday when you spoke on Enrons activities in this area I would be interested in exploring the possibility of joining the group that works on real options in response to and in anticipation of Enrons business requirements Im currently working in the development and application of real options methodology at Schlumberger In particular Ill be speaking at an industry Real Options Valuation conference in London financerov and I just had the paper accepted for publication in Operations Research Could you pass my resume on to the relevant people to have a look at Thanks in advance Chris Kenyon See attached file cmkenyoncvmaydoc Attachment Converted ceudoraattachcmkenyoncvmaydoc
